params._token: The address of the token to check

returns._canStake: Returns true if the token can be staked manually

claimRewards(address[]).details: Transfers a percentage of the crv and cvx rewards to claim AMPH tokens

params._tokenAddresses: The addresses of the erc20 tokens

params._tokenAddress: The address of the token collateral to check rewards for

returns._rewards: The array of all the available rewards

constructor.details: Must be called by VaultController, else it will not be registered as a vault in system

params._id: Unique id of the vault, ever increasing and tracked by VaultController
params._minter: Address of the person who created this vault

params._amount: The amount of tokens to move
params._to: The address to send the tokens to

params._amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw

depositERC20(address,uint256).details: Deposits and stakes on convex if token is of type CurveLPStakedOnConvex

params._amount: The amount of the token to deposit
params._token: The address of the token to deposit

params._increase: True to increase, false to decrease

stakeCrvLPCollateral(address).details: This can be called if the convex pool didn't exist when the token was registered         and was later updated

params._tokenAddress: The address of erc20 crvLP token

withdrawERC20(address,uint256).details: This can only be called by the minter         The withdraw will be denied if ones vault would become insolvent         If the withdraw token is of CurveLPStakedOnConvex then unstake and withdraw directly to user

params._amount: The amount of erc20 token to withdraw

canStake(address).notice: Returns true when user can manually stake their token balance

claimRewards(address[]).notice: Claims available rewards from multiple tokens

claimableRewards(address).notice: Returns an array of all the available rewards the user can claim

controllerTransfer(address,address,uint2.notice: Function used by the VaultController to transfer tokens

controllerWithdrawAndUnwrap(address,uint.notice: Function used by the VaultController to withdraw from convex

depositERC20(address,uint256).notice: Used to deposit a token to the vault

id().notice: Returns the id of the vault

minter().notice: Returns the minter of the vault

modifyLiability(bool,uint256).notice: Function used by the VaultController to reduce a vault's liability

stakeCrvLPCollateral(address).notice: Let's the user manually stake their crvLP

withdrawERC20(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws an erc20 token from the vault

statements.documentation: If it's type CurveLPStakedOnConvex then pool id can't be 0
In this case the user's balance isn't staked so we stake the amount + his balance for the specific tokenv
In this case the user's balance is already staked so we only stake the newly deposited amount
